text: My otpravili k mad'yanitam ikh brata Shuyeyba. On skazal: Â«O moy narod! Poklonyaytes' Allakhu, ibo net u vas drugogo bozhestva, krome Nego. K vam yavilos' yasnoye znameniye ot vashego Gospoda. Napolnyayte zhe meru i vesy spolna, ne priderzhivayte imushchestva lyudey i ne rasprostranyayte nechestiya na zemle posle togo, kak na ney naveden poryadok. Tak luchshe dlya vas, yesli tol'ko vy yavlyayetes' veruyushchimi
